title: An Act relative to motorcycle permit requirements

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. O'Connor, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2430) of Patrick M. O'Connor for legislation relative to motorcycle permit requirements.  Transportation.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Transportation
